## Marginal Mean: What do you mean?

## 2x2 Table

First, lets start with a 2x2 table. It could be of anything really, but let's imagine we have two groups of people





+------------------+--------------------+-----------------+---------+
|                  | Bubble Gum Chewers | Tobacco Chewers | Total   |
|                  |                    |                 |         |
|                  | (n = 426)          | ( n = 359)      |         |
+:================:+:==================:+:===============:+:=======:+
| **Sore Jaw**     | 78                 | 228             | 306     |
+------------------+--------------------+-----------------+---------+
| **Not Sore Jaw** | 348                | 131             | 479     |
+------------------+--------------------+-----------------+---------+
|                  | 426                | 359             | **785** |
+------------------+--------------------+-----------------+---------+
